lines.text: [last lines]
[Inga's boyfriend knocks on her window after she is back home from her sexual awakening in Stockholm]

[sitting with Inga in her room]
Here are the boys. Ole wants to take you to the movie.
I have to ask mother first.
[after Inga settles in her sister's and Carsten's apartment]
What are you taking at school?
I'm taking the required program.
Do you like it?
Yes.

[lights a cigarette]
Smoke?
No, thank you.
You don't smoke. Do you drink?
No.
What DO you do?
I'm in school.
Oh yes, I know, you just told me. But, I mean, after school?
I do my homework.
Oh. How nice. But I mean at NIGHT, for excitement.
Sometimes me and my friends are going to the movies.
Your friend?
My boyfriend. We are going steady.
So you're going steady... what does that mean? Does it mean you're, ah, holding hands in public or maybe you read poetry together?
Sometimes.
[Carsten puts his hand on his face in frustration]
